actor

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • actor.Entity
        • actor.Item

  • public class Item
extends Entity
    The Item class represents the items used in the system. Each Item has a state describing its availability.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(ItemType pItemType)
      Constructs an item with the given item type
